name: Caster's Trap
description:
"Say Mouse, I take it that you're not a Caster."

A mysterious cabin, as old as time, with secrets unbeknownst to the world.



Caster's Trap is an exploration puzzle horror game inside a small cabin. Explore the cabin, examine its secrets, and revisit old rooms with new items to unveil the secret magic that once existed in the world, how it twisted the fate of the cabin, and the beings who once lived inside.


Features
  • ~2 hours of gameplay
  • Survive against ghosts, spirits, and otherworldly beings
  • Carry a small orb with a calming blue glow
  • Chill by a fireplace while reminiscing old times
  • Get occasionally berated by a blonde girl who supposedly knows better
  • Three alternative endings with the true ending as depicted by the player
